ns0:simpleDc.ns2:title: Energy feedbacks of northern high-latitude ecosystems to the climate system due to reduced snow cover during 20th century warming-III
ns0:simpleDc.ns2:subject: vegetation
vegetation

ns0:dcTerms.ns2:abstract: This data file contains data for the pan-arctic vegetation map depicted in Figure 1 of Euskirchen et al (2007). See Euskirchen et al. (2007) for further details on the construction of this map.
